structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS

law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 30, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 227, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2380b-3.
